about_the_game:
Welcome to Wintervale Keep. This JRPG fashioned 3D game will send you on an adventure of a lifetime. Now is chance to scour the depths of the dungeons below Wintervale Keep.

Once you arrive and establish yourself in town, It's time to enter the dungeon. You check your equipment and make way for the gates.

From there on you quickly find out that there are more people within the dungeon than once thought... Things are a bit cutthroat and they are all after whatever treasures await them within the floors below.

From there, you will not only experience battles with a Classic RPG feel but you will also be subjected to puzzles that will unlock the abilities to call in cameo actors that aid you in battle.

Perhaps you take a break from exploring the dungeon and try your might in the Battle Arena.

Or maybe you find a rare synthesis recipe and decide to go scour the dungeon in hopes to come across potion ingredients or maybe ore and other raw materials in hopes to craft.

Regardless, prepare! prepare! prepare!

You will need to do everything you can to survive within the dungeon. Not only is it filled with traps meant to stop you and anyone else. It's mainly everyone else you need to worry about.

Enemies can be unpredictable. Just when you think things are going fine, they may leave you begging for mercy. (Guarding is a thing and will help greatly!)

So level up. Get stronger. Claim all that Wintervale has to offer as your own.

Below are just a small handful of enemies you will encounter.

The battles will consist of humanoid and non-humanoid monsters.

(All humanoid enemies or party members WILL suffer from armor degradation) 

I.E. Nudity

A cut scene will appear after each new humanoid enemy you defeat as well.

content_descriptors.notes:
There is only nudity in the game no sexual content.
Battles show armor damage and exposes body parts.
At the end of 1st time battles you are also awarded with a still image that has nudity,

detailed_description:
Welcome to Wintervale Keep. This JRPG fashioned 3D game will send you on an adventure of a lifetime. Now is chance to scour the depths of the dungeons below Wintervale Keep.

Once you arrive and establish yourself in town, It's time to enter the dungeon. You check your equipment and make way for the gates.

From there on you quickly find out that there are more people within the dungeon than once thought... Things are a bit cutthroat and they are all after whatever treasures await them within the floors below.

From there, you will not only experience battles with a Classic RPG feel but you will also be subjected to puzzles that will unlock the abilities to call in cameo actors that aid you in battle.

Perhaps you take a break from exploring the dungeon and try your might in the Battle Arena.

Or maybe you find a rare synthesis recipe and decide to go scour the dungeon in hopes to come across potion ingredients or maybe ore and other raw materials in hopes to craft.

Regardless, prepare! prepare! prepare!

You will need to do everything you can to survive within the dungeon. Not only is it filled with traps meant to stop you and anyone else. It's mainly everyone else you need to worry about.

Enemies can be unpredictable. Just when you think things are going fine, they may leave you begging for mercy. (Guarding is a thing and will help greatly!)

So level up. Get stronger. Claim all that Wintervale has to offer as your own.

Below are just a small handful of enemies you will encounter.

The battles will consist of humanoid and non-humanoid monsters.

(All humanoid enemies or party members WILL suffer from armor degradation) 

I.E. Nudity

A cut scene will appear after each new humanoid enemy you defeat as well.
name: Wintervale Keep

pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11
  • Processor: i7
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM

short_description: After several failed adventures, You decide to set out one more... Wintervale Keep. As you explore the dungeons of Wintervale, you will encounter other adventurers just the same. Their eyes full of lust for fortune and fame. Explore, level up and discover what lurks below in this retro 3D jrpg
